Migration of Object
Relational Mapping Tools in Legacy Java Applications
This thesis aims to find a replacement for the outdated object-relational mapping
tool Apache ObjectRelationalBridge (OJB) in a legacy Java application.
At first, a suitable replacement will be determined by comparing the most commonly
used persistence solutions in the Java environment. Performance tests
and other metrics will be taken into account. After a replacement has been determined,
the legacy application VISITE will be migrated to use the new ORM
tool. The necessary steps will be documented and any occurring problem discussed.
Several test iterations will be performed until the application is ready
to be tested in a semi-productive environment. In the end, an outlook on the
required future maintenance work will be given.
